sentence.Network_en: Punctually at 7.45, the express to Kuala Lumpur left Singapore station.
sentence.Network_cn: 7点45分，开往吉隆坡的特快列车准时驶离新加坡火车站。

sentence.Network_en: See to it that you are here punctually tomorrow.
sentence.Network_cn: 明天你务必要准时到这里.

entry.def: If you are punctual, you do something or arrive somewhere at the right time and are not late.

example.ex: He's always very punctual. I'll see if he's here yet.
example.tran: 他总是很准时。我去看看他是否已经来了。

sentences.sentence: "she was duly apprised of the raise"

auth_sentence.content: But it is far less certain that, once the cycle turns, the central banks will punctually tighten.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it is far less certain that, once the cycle turns, the central banks will punctually tighten.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it is far less certain that, once the cycle turns, the central banks will punctually tighten.

sentences.en: Every day he attends the office punctually.
sentences.cn: 每天他总是准时到办公室。

sentences.en: He arrived punctually at four o’clock.
See to it that you are here punctually tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 明天你务必要准时到这里。
